name: Maruti Swift
description: The price of Maruti Swift, a 5 seater Hatchback, ranges from Rs. 6.49  - 9.64 Lakh. It is available in 11 variants, with an engine of 1197 cc and a choice of 2 transmissions: Manual and Automatic. Swift comes with 6 airbags. Maruti Swift has a ground clearance of 163 mm  and is available in 9 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 24.8 to 25.75 kmpl for Swift.
